answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.Since your glucose was normal and there was no sugar in your urine, it sounds like the cause of your symptoms is not diabetes.  There are other possible causes for your symptoms and it would be a good idea to see your primary care doctor for a physical.  He or she can examine you, run some routine blood work and can help you figure out what is causing you symptoms.  Good luck.Bridget

question: I've had the diabetes symtomps...tingling feet and leg numbness, EYE PAIN AND WHITE TONGUE....I FASTED YESTERDAY AND THEN WENT TO THE CLINIC TO GET BLOOD TESTED FOR diabetes...they pricked my finger and my blood suger was 97 ...then tested my urine seen it was normal no sugar...then drew blood and send it the labratory...what's the chances of me being diabetic with all thr symtomps but my blood sugar was 97 and urine was good..???
title: worried sick please help..
